ptxt.intxrefpoff: Manual Transmission Unit Disassembly:Diesel Engine Model

s1.ptxt: Assemble input shaft assembly, main shaft assembly (1) and countershaft assembly (2), and then install them all together into front case (3).
Install new input shaft front bearing circlip (1) to front case using snap ring pliers (2)
Install new oil seal (1) to input shaft bearing retainer (2) facing its spring side upward in figure using special tool and hammer and then apply grease to oil seal lip.

Clean mating surfaces of both input shaft bearing retainer (1) and front case (2), and uniformly apply sealant to input shaft bearing retainer as shown in figure by such amount that its section is 1.5 mm (0.059 in.) in diameter, and then mate it with front case.
Install input shaft bearing retainer to front case with new bolts. Tighten bolts (3) to specified torque.
Install low speed gear shift shaft (1) and low speed gear shift fork (2) to front case (3).
Apply grease to gear shift shaft balls (4), and then install it to hole of front case (5) between low speed gear shift shaft and high speed gear shift shaft.
Install 5th & reverse gear shift fork (1) and high speed gear shift fork (2) to front case (3).
Apply grease to inter lock pin (4), and install it to high speed gear shift shaft (5), and then install high speed gear shift shaft to front case.
Apply grease to gear shift shaft balls (1), and then install it to hole of front case (2) between high speed gear shift shaft and 5th & reverse gear shift shaft.
Install 5th & reverse gear shift shaft (3) to front case (4).
Set new gear shift shaft inner pin (1) and outer pin (2) facing each gap (“a”, “b”) in the opposite direction as shown in figure. Drive each gear shift shaft pin by using special tool.

Clean mating surfaces of both front case (1) and rear case (2), and uniformly apply sealant to front case as shown in figure by such amount that its section is 1.5 mm (0.059 in.) in diameter, and then mate it with rear case.
Install front case to rear case. Tighten front case No.1 bolts (3) and No.2 bolts (4) to specified torque.

torqueitem.t-part: Front case No.1 bolt and No.2 bolt

s1.ptxt: Apply grease to gear shift locating balls (1) and springs (2), then install them. Apply sealant to gear shift locating bolts (3), and then tighten bolts to specified torque.
Install new circlip (1) of main shaft rear bearing to rear case using snap ring pliers (2).
Install reverse shift shaft (1), rear bearing plate (2) and oil gutter (3) as shown in figure. Tighten rear bearing plate bolts (4) to specified torque.
Install reverse shift limit spring (1) and cam (2) to reverse shift shaft (3), and then hook spring to rear bearing plate.
Set new gear shift shaft inner pin (4) and outer pin (5) facing each gap (“a”, “b”) in the opposite direction as shown in figure. Drive gear shift shaft pins by using special tool.
Install gear shift & select lever assembly (1) and each gear shift yoke (2).
Set new gear shift yoke inner pin (3) and outer pin (4) facing each gap (“a”, “b”) in the opposite direction as shown in figure. Drive gear shift yoke pin by using special tool.

Clean mating surfaces of both rear case (1) and adapter case (2), and uniformly apply sealant to rear case as shown in figure by such amount that its section is 1.5 mm (0.059 in.) in diameter, and then mate it with adapter case.
Install rear case to adapter case. Tighten adapter case No.1 bolts (3), No.3 bolt (5) and new adapter case No.2 bolt (4) to specified torque.

torqueitem.t-part: Adapter case No.1 bolt and No.3 bolt

s1.ptxt: Clean mating surfaces of both reverse idle gear case (1) and rear case (2), and uniformly apply sealant to reverse idle gear case as shown in figure by such amount that its section is 1.5 mm (0.059 in.) in diameter, and then mate it with rear case.
Install reverse idle gear case to rear case with new bolts. Tighten No.1 bolts (4) and No.2 bolts (3) to specified torque.

torqueitem.t-part: Reverse idle gear case No.1 bolt and No.2 bolt

s1.ptxt: Apply grease to select guide pins (1), and then install select guide pins, select return low speed spring (long) (2) and select return 5th & reverse spring (short) (3). Apply sealant to select return bolts, and then tighten bolts (4) to specified torque.
Install buck up light switch (1), new washer and pin to front case (2) referring to Back Up Light Switch Removal and Installation:Diesel Engine Model .
Install clutch operating cylinder assembly to transmission front case referring to Clutch Operating Cylinder Assembly Removal and Installation .
